pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 3, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Equal Voiceâ€™s Seating of Daughters of the Vote in the House of Commons, and deliver remarks.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Inuit-Crown Partnership Committee Leaders Meeting, and deliver brief opening remarks.

Room 2005, 2nd Floor
James Michael Flaherty Building
90 Elgin Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for brief opening remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
